definitions.definition: A divination based on the appearance and behaviour of animals.
An omen or prediction ; a foreboding ; a prophecy .
An event that is experienced as indicating important things to come.

main_definition: A divination based on the appearance and behaviour of animals.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An omen or prediction ; a foreboding ; a prophecy .
An event that is experienced as indicating important things to come.
